body.p: To determine the portion of a replacement award that is part of the consideration transferred for the acquiree and the portion that is remuneration for post‑combination service, the acquirer shall measure both the replacement awards granted by the acquirer and the acquiree awards as of the acquisition date in accordance with IFRS 2. The portion of the market‑based measure of the replacement award that is part of the consideration transferred in exchange for the acquiree equals the portion of the acquiree award that is attributable to pre‑combination service.
